games.name: Valorant
games.info: Valorant is a free-to-play multiplayer tactical first-person shooter video game developed and published by Riot Games.

games.name: Fortnite
games.info: Fortnite is an online video game developed by Epic Games and released in 2017.

games.name: League of Legends
games.info: League of Legends is a multiplayer online battle arena video game developed and published by Riot Games.

games.name: Counter-Strike
games.info: Counter-Strike: Global Offensive is a multiplayer first-person shooter video game developed by Valve and Hidden Path Entertainment.

games.name: Minecraft
games.info: Minecraft is a sandbox video game developed by Mojang.

games.name: Overwatch
games.info: Overwatch is a team-based multiplayer first-person shooter developed and published by Blizzard Entertainment.

games.name: World of Warcraft
games.info: World of Warcraft is a massively multiplayer online role-playing game released by Blizzard Entertainment.

games.name: Apex Legends
games.info: Apex Legends is a free-to-play battle royale game developed by Respawn Entertainment and published by Electronic Arts.

games.name: FIFA 22
games.info: FIFA 22 is a football simulation video game published by Electronic Arts as part of the FIFA series.

games.name: Call of Duty
games.info: Call of Duty: Warzone is a free-to-play battle royale video game released by Activision.
